P

Paragraph - Class in com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure
NLP Data Structure - Paragraph Paragraph data structure is created by TextFile and responsible for splitting input string into Sentence(s) using regular expression as sentence boundary: (\.|\?|\!|\."|\.'|\?"|\?'|\!"|\!')\s+[A-Z|"|'] This regular expression will match punctuation at the end of the sentence: .
Paragraph() - Constructor for class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.Paragraph
Default constructor
ParagraphTest - Class in com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.test
 
ParagraphTest() - Constructor for class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.test.ParagraphTest
 
processString(String) - Method in class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.Paragraph
Processing string input splitting it into sentences using regular expression and adding each sentence into ArrayList
processString(String) - Method in class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.Sentence
Processing string input splitting it into Word(s) and/or Punctuation(s) using non-word regular expression
processString(String) - Method in class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.TextFile
 
Punctuation - Class in com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure
NLP Data Structure - Punctuation Punctuation data structure is created by Sentence and responsible for identifying non-word sentence items such as punctuation.
Punctuation() - Constructor for class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.Punctuation
Default constructor
Punctuation(String) - Constructor for class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.Punctuation
Constructor which takes a String to initialize punctuation
PunctuationTest - Class in com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.test
 
PunctuationTest() - Constructor for class com.dr.nlp.sl.datastructure.test.PunctuationTest
